title: OT60: Openitentiary
summary:
Key ideas:
- Structure can be helpful for productivity
- There are different structures that can work for different people
- Accountability can be helpful in sticking to a structure
- Flexibility is important to allow for unexpected events
- Experimentation is key in finding the right structure for an individual

Key learnings:
- Finding a structure that works for you can increase productivity
- Accountability can be a helpful tool in sticking to a structure
- Flexibility is important in order to make a structure sustainable

Key questions:
- What elements of a structure are most important for my productivity?
- How can I hold myself accountable to a structure?
- What adjustments can I make to my structure to make it more sustainable?
